text: Helen Sommers (March 29, 1932 â€“ March 7, 2017) was an American politician. She served in the Washington House of Representatives from 1972 to 2009. She represented the 36th district, as a member of the Democratic Party. At the time of her retirement she was the state's longest serving legislator. Sommers was born in Woodbury Heights, New Jersey. She studied at the University of Washington.Helen Sommers: An Oral History, Washington State Legislature. Accessed November 4, 2015. "Helen Sommers grew up in Woodbury Heights, New Jersey, in the '30s." Sommers died on March 7, 2017 in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida from natural causes, aged 84. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Helen Sommers
